content.text:
# Boston Society of Film Critics Awards 1993

14th BSFC Awards
December 19, 1993
----
Best Film:
''' Schindler's List
The 14th Boston Society of Film Critics Awards honored the best filmmaking of 1993. The awards were given on 19 December 1993
Winners
*Best Film:'
**Schindler's List
*Best Actor:
**Daniel Day-Lewis – In the Name of the Father
*Best Actress:
**Holly Hunter – The Piano
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Ralph Fiennes – Schindler's List
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Rosie Perez – Fearless
*Best Director:
**Steven Spielberg – Schindler's List
*Best Screenplay:
**Robert Altman and Frank Barhydt – Short Cuts
*Best Cinematography:
**Janusz Kamiński – Schindler's List
*Best Documentary:
**Visions of Light
*Best Foreign-Language Film:
**Farewell My Concubine (Ba wang bie ji) • China/Hong Kong
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20121011145714/http://www.thebsfc.org/PastWin.html Past Winners]
References
*[https://www.imdb.com/event/ev0000112/1993 1993 Boston Society of Film Critics Awards] Internet Movie Database''
